name: SendEvent
description:
Sends event to the channel

Sends events:
- any

Required permissions:
- SendCustomEvent

EventRequest.description: Represents an BaseEvent that happened in Stream Chat

parent_id.description: ID of thread. Used in typing events
parent_id.title: Parent ID

reason.description: Ban reason. Only applicable to `user.banned` BaseEvent
reason.title: Reason

type.description: Event type. To use custom BaseEvent types see Custom Events documentation
type.title: Type

watcher_count.description: Number of watchers who received this BaseEvent
watcher_count.title: Watcher count

EventRequest.title: Event

auto_translation_enabled.description: Whether auto translation is enabled or not
auto_translation_enabled.title: Auto translation

auto_translation_language.description: Language to translate to when auto translation is active
auto_translation_language.title: Auto translation language

cooldown.description: Cooldown period after sending each message
cooldown.title: Cooldown

frozen.description: Whether channel is frozen or not
frozen.title: Frozen

hidden.description: Whether this channel is hidden by current user or not
hidden.title: Hidden

hide_messages_before.description: Date since when the message history is accessible
hide_messages_before.title: Hide messages before

last_message_at.description: Date of the last message sent
last_message_at.title: Last message at

member_count.description: Number of members in the channel
member_count.title: Member count

muted.description: Whether this channel is muted or not
muted.title: Muted

own_capabilities.description: List of channel capabilities of authenticated user
own_capabilities.title: Own Capabilities

team.description: Team the channel belongs to (multi-tenant only)
team.title: Team

truncated_at.description: Date of the latest truncation of the channel
truncated_at.title: Truncated At

x-stream-map.description: List of grants modifiers that apply to a role
x-stream-map.title: Grants

args.description: Arguments help text, shown in commands auto-completion
args.title: Arguments

set.description: Set name used for grouping commands
set.title: Set

banned.description: Whether a user is banned or not
banned.title: Banned

role.description: Determines the set of user permissions
role.title: Role

teams.description: List of teams user is a part of
teams.title: Teams

banned.description: Whether member is banned this channel or not
banned.title: Banned

channel_role.description: Role of the member in the channel
channel_role.title: Channel Role

invited.description: Whether member was invited or not
invited.title: Invited

is_moderator.description: Whether member is channel moderator or not
is_moderator.title: Is moderator

role.description: Permission level of the member in the channel (DEPRECATED: use channel_role instead)
role.title: Role

shadow_banned.description: Whether member is shadow banned in this channel or not
shadow_banned.title: Shadow banned

disabled.description: Whether device is disabled or not
disabled.title: Disabled

disabled_reason.description: Reason explaining why device had been disabled
disabled_reason.title: Reason

before_message_send_failed.description: Whether `before_message_send webhook` failed or not. Field is only accessible in push webhook
before_message_send_failed.title: Before Message Send Failed

html.description: Contains HTML markup of the message. Can only be set when using server-side API
html.title: HTML content

i18n.description: Object with translations. Key `language` contains the original language key. Other keys contain translations
i18n.title: Internationalization info

id.description: Message ID is unique string identifier of the message
id.title: ID

latest_reactions.description: List of 10 latest reactions to this message
latest_reactions.title: Latest reactions

mml.description: Should be empty if `text` is provided. Can only be set when using server-side API
mml.title: Messaging Markup Language

own_reactions.description: List of 10 latest reactions of authenticated user to this message
own_reactions.title: Own reactions

pinned.description: Whether message is pinned or not
pinned.title: Pinned

reaction_counts.description: An object containing number of reactions of each type. Key: reaction type (string), value: number of reactions (int)
reaction_counts.title: Reaction counts

reaction_scores.description: An object containing scores of reactions of each type. Key: reaction type (string), value: total score of reactions (int)
reaction_scores.title: Reaction scores

reply_count.description: Number of replies to this message
reply_count.title: Reply count

shadowed.description: Whether the message was shadowed or not
shadowed.title: Shadowed

show_in_channel.description: Whether thread reply should be shown in the channel as well
show_in_channel.title: Show in channel

silent.description: Whether message is silent or not
silent.title: Silent

text.description: Text of the message. Should be empty if `mml` is provided
text.title: Text

thread_participants.description: List of users who participate in thread
thread_participants.title: Thread participants

ReactionRequest.description: Represents user reaction to a message

message_id.description: ID of a message user reacted to
message_id.title: Message ID

score.description: Reaction score. If not specified reaction has score of 1
score.title: Score

user_id.description: ID of a user who reacted to a message
user_id.title: User ID

ReactionRequest.title: Reaction
